name: Teefan's Ultimate Piano
description:
A simple, but realistic midi piano simulation game.

All songs are in the C major key, with all the standard note positions, colors and numbers. You can use these numbers or note names to play on a real piano if you remembered them.

Playable songs list:

  • A Thousand Years
  • Aerith's Theme
  • Colors of the Wind
  • Faded
  • Hallelujah
  • Kiss The Rain
  • Let Her Go
  • Let It Go
  • My Heart Will Go On
  • River Flows in You
  • Someone You Loved
  • Tifa's Theme

More will be added later!
